main_definition: To concentrate attention or effort on a particular task, object, or idea.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Concentration of visual perception in one area
meanings_and_examples.example: When reading a book, the focus is on understanding and absorbing the content.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The center or most important aspect of something
meanings_and_examples.example: In her presentation, she emphasized that customer satisfaction was the focus of their business strategy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To direct energy and attention on a specific goal or task
meanings_and_examples.example: He focused all his energy on training for the marathon and eventually completed it successfully.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The central point of interest in an image, often seen through a camera lens
meanings_and_examples.example: The photographer adjusted the focus to capture sharp images of the landscape.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make something a priority or give it importance
meanings_and_examples.example: Improving employee morale has become the focus for our management team this year.
